articles.content:

articles.title: NASA sends squid from Hawaii into space for research - The Associated Press
articles.description: HONOLULU (AP) — Dozens of baby squid from Hawaii are in space for study.  The baby Hawaiian bobtail squid were raised at the University of Hawaii's Kewalo Marine Laboratory and were blasted into space earlier this month on a SpaceX resupply mission to the Int…

articles.title: Clash of the Titans: Hubble telescope captures cataclysmic cosmic collision of galaxy pair on verge of merging - RT
articles.description: With the aid of the NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope, astronomers have captured a new photo of a collision in the IC 1623 galaxy system. The galaxy pair is in its final stages of merging, which will then create new star formations.
articles.content:
The collision of the galaxy pair featured as Picture of the Week for Hubble, captioned “Clash of the Titans” on Monday.
